about_the_game:
Fielding Shredder's iconic red Nissan S14 from the TV show Hyper-drive!
Add this car to your garage and slide it in both online events and all practice modes.

Note: This car is pre-built which means it cannot be extensively tuned or customised.
detailed_description:
Fielding Shredder's iconic red Nissan S14 from the TV show Hyper-drive!
Add this car to your garage and slide it in both online events and all practice modes.

Note: This car is pre-built which means it cannot be extensively tuned or customised.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-9400F or AMD Ryzen 5 3600
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2GB (GeForce GTX 970 / amd RX 5500 XT)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
